content.raw: Grid layouts would be a little tricky, since the DDS widget is actually three Analog widgets which have their own subwidgets. What I could do though is tell the analog widgets to not have labels, and then add labels at the level of the DDS widget. This would ensure that the left edge of the spinboxes were aligned with each other. And I'm not sure we want the other boxes to be aligned - is that worth the extra horizontal space it would take up to have 'hardware' left aligned with 'MHz'?
